metadata.title: CVE-2024-37385 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Roundcube Webmail before 1.5.7 and 1.6.x before 1.6.7 on Windows allowscommand injection via im_convert_path and im_identify_path. NOTE: thisissue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-12641.

criterions.comment: roundcube package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
